EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Final reminder to non-registrants
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register for Pivotal's Toronto Office Grand Opening on Oct. 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register for Pivotal Toronto Office Grand Opening Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Pivotal's Toronto office Grand Opening event is almost here!
Join us and industry leaders from across Toronto on Thursday, October 2nd for this evening of drinks, hors d'oeuvres, entertainment and great networking.
There are only a few spots remaining so register today <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>.
CLICK HERE TO CONFIRM YOUR ATTENDANCE. <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
We look forward to hosting you this Thursday!
Sincerely, Farhan Thawar VP Engineering Canada, Pivotal Labs EVENT DETAILS PIVOTAL OFFICE 1 Toronto St 11th Floor Toronto, ON Thursday, October 2nd 6pm - 9pm CONFIRM ATTENDANCE <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
